projects.name: Track Tube
points: Track Tube helps student watch and track youtube playlist videos without distraction.
Utilized ReactJs for frontend, NodeJs for backend and Mongodb for backend of the app.
Users can save Youtube Playlists and also save Progress (watched videos) of the playlist.
For demo: Id: admin@gmail.com and Pass: admin

projects.name: Media Player
points: Developed a Media Player using JavaFX ( A framework for building cross-platform desktop apps )
Leveraged Java programming language, CSS styling, and JavaFX's libraries to create interactive user interface.
Users can save Youtube Playlists and also save Progress (watched videos) of the playlist.
Implemented multimedia format support, playback controls, and auto subtitle display.

achievements: Secured First position among 150 participants in CodeStorm event organized under GTU TECHFEST 2022.
Global Rank: 332 in Codechef Starters 72 Div3
Under 1k rank among 25k+ participants in Codeforces Round 856 Div2
Rank 856 among 24k+ participants in Leetcode Weekly Contest 355
Solved more than 850+ problems over all platforms
